page.title: 07A DAY IN THE LIFE(1)
page.content: MOST MORNINGS I GET UP AT HALF PAST SEVEN.TODAY I GOT UP AT HALF PAST SEVEN.I PUT MY SCHOOL CLOTHES ON AND WENT DOWN STAIRS FOR SOME TEA AND TOAST.AFTER BREAKFAST I WENT TO PLAY WITH MY SPACE LEGO. AT HALF PAST EIGHT WE WALKED UP OUR STEEP ROAD. AT NINE FIFTEEN WE HAVE REACHED THE SCHOOL.THEN WE GET MATHS,LANGUAGE,AND PROJECT.WE HAVE DINNER AT HALF PAST TWELVE.THE SCHOOL SESSION ENDS AT THREE FIFTEEN. WHEN I GET HOME I HAVE A BAG OF CRISPS AND WATCH TELEVISION.AFTER THAT I HAVE TEA.FINALLY I PLAY ON MY COMPUTER AND THEN GO TO BED.
